text.autoconfig.frycparry.title: Sword Parry Config
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.shieldP: Parry ticks for shield. For example, if this option is set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with shield will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enableB: Enable blocking and parrying with swords
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.swordPa: Parry ticks for sword. For example, if this option is set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with sword will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enableB: Enable blocking and parrying with axes
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.axeParr: Parry ticks for axe. For example, if this option is set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with axe will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.disable: Disable block action after parrying axe attack
When turned on, axe attack will set cooldown whether it was parry or not
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enableB: 0 - player can block and parry with empty offhand;  1 - player can also block and parry when dual wields weapons; 2 - player can block and parry with any item in offhand (it is recommended to block with parry key (R by default) to avoid conflicts)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.parryKn: Parry knockback strength for parried mobs
Defines the strength of knockback enemy will take after parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.disarmF: 20 = 1 second. Set it to 0 to disable disarm
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.parryKn: Parry knockback strength for parried players
Defines the strength of knockback player will take after parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.interru: Interrupt block action after successful block or parry with sword
Interrupt block action after successful block or parry with axe
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.swordBl: % of damage taken when blocking melee attacks with sword
For example, if this option is set to 90, player will get 90% of the original damage after blocking melee attack with sword
% of damage taken when blocking arrows with sword
For example, if this option is set to 90, player will get 90% of the original damage after blocking arrow with sword
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.axeBloc: % of damage taken when blocking melee attacks with axe
For example, if this option is set to 10, player will get 10% of the original damage after blocking melee attack with axe
% of damage taken when blocking arrows with axe
For example, if this option is set to 10, player will get 10% of the original damage after blocking arrow with axe
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.weaknes: 20 = 1 second. Set it to 0 to disable weakness
For example, when set to 2, player will get Weakness II after getting parried
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.slownes: 20 = 1 second. Set it to 0 to disable slowness
For example, when set to 5, player will get Slowness V after getting parried
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.weaknes: 20 = 1 second. Set it to 0 to disable weakness
For example, when set to 2, mob will get Weakness II after getting parried
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.slownes: 20 = 1 second. Set it to 0 to disable slowness
For example, when set to 5, mob will get Slowness V after getting parried
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.cooldow: Block cooldown after switching item or interrupting block action
Block cooldown after attacking enemy with sword
Block cooldown after attacking enemy with axe
